ygData.subject: Re: BlackFortress
ygData.msgSnippet: Location: Black Fortress. Nightshift, Tucson Prime, Rat Trap and Quickstride. Inside the fortress: Night Shift is almost caught by surprise by his own shiruken

Location: Black Fortress.

Nightshift, Tucson Prime, Rat Trap and Quickstri=
de.

Inside the fortress:

Night Shift is almost caught by surprise by his =
own shiruken and manages to swerve around it, with a screech in his tires. =
 He was hoping to get one of the enemies to shoot at him,thinking that by m=
istake they may just blast one of the control pannels that controls the for=
tress accidentally, thus allowing him to slip out.  With his night vision h=
e spots a main control pannel, and realizes that Scorponok is shooting at h=
im with the plasma cannons, as is Scourge, who is content on trying to fry =
his carborator.  He remains quiet, yet continues to speed around the room, =
hoping that at least one of them would take the bait.  He wasn't running sc=
ared, he was clearly up to something strategic.  He thinks to himself.

" I=
 knew you bozos were stupid enough ta buy inta me.  That's it, keep shootn'=
 my way, eventually I'm gonna make a move toward one of them power boxes an=
d then whoops, someone's gonna hit somethn' by accident."

He sends a silen=
t com to Lord Elder.

" Nightshift reportn' in Sir.  I'm fine, just gettn' =
the chase of a lifetime in here, nothn' serious.  I got a few dings on the =
fenders but nothn' that can't be banged out with a hammer.  Look, guys, I a=
in't found Nightlight, Rodimus or Windlord, but I'm kinda playn' a game of =
catn' mouse with the baddies.  Hopn' ta get one of them ta mess up'n hit a =
power box by accident, instead of hittn' me... OHHHH SCRAP!"

He screeches =
loudly as he avoids another close call with a plasma blast.

"That was almo=
st my left front tire, close one.   Anyway, I really could use a hand in he=
re, I dunno how much longer my fuel reserves are gonna hold out.  I'm at ab=
out a half a tank now, and the way I'm gon' here, that ain't gonna take lon=
g ta go through... Gotta burn rubber, talk later, Nightshift out."

Outside=
 the fortress, Tucson Prime comes out of his trance.  He holds his chest fo=
r just a moment.

"Sorry guys, I didn't mean to frighten you. I just got qu=
ite the wakeup call.  We need to get into that fortress but first we need t=
o short out the control pannel that keeps it beneath that magma pool."

Rat=
 Trap shrugs.  

"Lord Elder did mention somethn' about blastn' inta the po=
ol, but we ain't got that kinda fire power on us."

Tuscon grins confidentl=
y.

"That's all right, I do.  Stand back, the first step to bringing light =
to a black flame, is to create a backdraft.  On second thought, I better do=
 this in vehicle mode. I can assure your saftey better than being in robot =
mode."

He transforms into his missile truck mode, and opens his doors to h=
is cab.

"Lord Elder, I'm back, just needed to consult someone as to my nex=
t move.  It's my first day on the job as a Prime and I needed a little insi=
de advice.  And I got it.  Kup, I also read you, and I'm going to expidite =
this mission a bit.  It's dragged on far too long.  Time for action not bea=
ting around the rotary."

He lines himself up for the shot and aims both mi=
ssile carriers at the pool, targeting not in the center of the pool, but a =
slight before getting to the middle of the magma chamber.  Rat Trap and Qui=
ckstride buckle in, to anticipate the major kick back Tucson's missile laun=
chers may have.  Then, Tucson fires, as they kick back, causing him to lurc=
h backward slightly as he gets used to firing them at the same time.

"Ughh=
, felt that.. Are you two okay?"

Rat Trap is now on top of Quickstride, wh=
o is now looking to the control pannel.

"Umm, we're - okay.. Just a little=
 - bit shell shocked.  Wowwww...  Talk about kick back...  It wasn't like y=
a didn't warn us because ya did but we weren't expecting that..."

Rat Trap=
 rubs his head.

"Yeah, talk about the big bang theory."

Tucson rolls forw=
ard just a slight.

" It even kicked me back a few feet.  I have to learn t=
o ground my tires when I use those missiles.  Sorry about that."

Rat Trap =
gets back into his seat and buckles up.

"So, how are we gonna get through =
this?

Tucson parks himself safely waiting for the results of his launch.

=
" We're going to relight the dark flame.  I have the power within me, the p=
ower of the Matrix.  The dark flame, represents Rodimus, who's armor is bla=
ck as pitch and flaming paint job dimmed to a drap pale color.  That's the =
fire I need to rekindle."

Rat Trap gasps as does Quickstride.

"But Wheels=
, that might that might do a number on ya."

Tuscon sighs.

" I know Rat Tr=
ap, it will.  I'll still be a Prime no matter what happens, but if all goes=
 well, we will get Rodimus back and Cyclonus will pay for his deeds against=
 Primus.  It's worth the risk my friends, it's worth the risk."

Rat Trap s=
heds a tear.

"But but what if it kills ya? What's Talon gonna do without y=
a?  What am I gonna do without ya? Wheels, you're the only real friend I ev=
er did have.  I don't wanna lose ya."

Tucson could feel a tear drip on his=
 dashboard.  

" I promise you Rat Trap, neither Talon or you is going to l=
ose me that easilly.  I may be out of commission for a few days, but it's n=
ot going to kill me. Remember when we talked about the most powerful force =
in the universe?  How nothing could ever surpass that?"

Rat Trap nodds.

"=
 I think so.  Ya told me that love is a force no one can reckon with.  Noth=
ing breaks the bond of friendship no matter how powerful evil becomes.  Lov=
e knows no boundaries and is the only infinite force that keeps on living e=
ven when one has passed on long ago."

Tucson gently straps Rat Trap in mor=
e securely.

"That's right Rat Trap.  Remember that.  It's our bond as frie=
nds that can never be broken.  All of us, including Talon, Elita, Kup, Lord=
 Elder, Depthcharge, Lord Perseus, Legacy, Guardia, and Ravenchief have the=
 power within ourselves not because of tyranical strength, but because of t=
hat one thing that neither Hydras, Megatron or Galvatron ever had.  And tha=
t was True Love.  They rule with force, not with compassion.  Our heart is =
what is going to win us this battle, our hearts are going to come together =
as one and we will save those that need to be saved, and rekindle the light=
s that have nearly been blown out."

He starts up his engines.

" NOW, LET'=
S DO THIS!  FOR RODIMUS PRIME!"

Rat Trap and Quickstride join in.

"FOR RO=
DIMUS PRIME, LEADER OF THE AUTOBOTS!"

Tucson fires several more rounds int=
o the magma.

s as to how to help, "Perhaps you can

at down there though, I don't know.

 clearly more than I have, don't
